name: Gravity Flip'd
description:
You play as an astronaut hurtling through a spacecraft. The ship is failing and the objects around you are now dangerous projectiles and obstacles. You must run through the ship, avoiding these obstacles by hitting space to flip the gravity, trying to get to the end where you will be able to get to an escape pod- it is your only hope.

A one button gravity flipping endless runner.

Collect stars, avoid explosives and don't fall out of the ship!

CONTROLS:

Spacebar - flip gravity
